name: Untitled Game Teaser
description:
SUMMARY

As someone who’s experiencing domestic violence inside his household, Marche decides to leave and find the nearest relative he can think of. However, he doesn’t know where exactly they are right now in Manila and he barely remembers their faces. At least, he knows their names and the place where he can start his search. He already saved up enough money to cover the travel fee and his lodging’s expenses before they finally reunite. He recognized it as a big risk but he can’t stay another night inside his home.

CONTROLS - press "Spacebar/Enter" to continue.

(In-development)
Made in Godot Engine 3.2.2

MADE BY:
Story/Art - Lyreina
Music/Sound Design - Michael Macapagal
(https://michaelmacapagal.itch.io/)
Programming/Art - RR Peralta
(https://noitisoprepus.itch.io/)
